Apache Tomcat


@WebServlet(String url)
	> create a webpage that is accesible in
		localhost:<HTTP:\1.1>/url

EX:
@WebServlet("/Welcome")
public class Welcome extends HttpServlet {
	private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;

	protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		PrintWriter out = response.getWriter();
		out.println("Welcome to my welcome servlet");
	}
}

	> since we have HTTP:\1.1 in port 8090, we will be able to access this in localhost





Servlet
	> used to create logic behind the website
